articles.author: Helen Collis
articles.title: WHO calls for global audit of smallpox, monkeypox jabs and fair access - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Many countries have emergency stockpiles which could be needed for unusual monkeypox outbreaks across the world, agency says.
articles.content: The World Health Organization has urged countries that have stockpiled doses of smallpox and monkeypox vaccines and treatments to engage in talks to fairly distribute the doses where they are now mos… [+6000 chars]

articles.title: Lyon dominate Toulon to land maiden Challenge Cup crown - The42
articles.description: It’s a first European title for the Top 14 team.
